intent_atoms.description: As a third‑party developer I want to opt into tolerant parsing via ParsePipeline.Options so that my application can parse corrupted media files and collect corruption metrics.

SDK documentation includes a TolerantParsingGuide.md article with 5+ working code examples covering basic setup, accessing issues, filtering by severity, custom options configuration, and strict vs tolerant comparison.
ParsePipeline.Options has comprehensive inline DocC comments for all properties, presets (.strict and .tolerant), and PayloadValidationLevel enum cases.
The Documentation.md Topics section contains a new "Tolerant Parsing" topic linking to the guide article.
Test file TolerantParsingDocTests.swift verifies that all documented code patterns compile, execute correctly, and match preset values.
ParsePipeline.Options.tolerant preset must not alter any existing public API behavior beyond enabling tolerant parsing mode.
Documentation is structured using DocC markdown with Topics organization to improve discoverability of tolerant parsing features.

functional_units.name: TolerantParsingGuide Article
functional_units.description: DocC article providing overview, use cases, setup, issue access, advanced config, best practices for tolerant parsing

functional_units.name: ParsePipeline.Options API
functional_units.description: Public struct exposing configuration options for parsing pipelines, including presets .strict and .tolerant

functional_units.name: ParsePipeline.live(options:) Method
functional_units.description: Creates a ParsePipeline instance configured with given Options

functional_units.name: ParseIssueStore Component
functional_units.description: Stores and queries ParseIssue objects collected during parsing

functional_units.name: ParseIssue Representation
functional_units.description: Individual issue object containing severity, code, message, byte range

functional_units.name: Documentation.md Topics Section
functional_units.description: Catalog entry linking to TolerantParsingGuide article

functional_units.name: Code Examples in Documentation
functional_units.description: Five+ copy‑paste ready snippets demonstrating tolerant parsing usage and issue handling

functional_units.name: Test Suite TolerantParsingDocTests
functional_units.description: Automated tests verifying documented API patterns, preset values, and issue querying
